entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
